name: Carrot Cake Granola Balls Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: oats, walnuts, almond, peanut butter, honey, cinnamon, carrot, raisin
recipeInstructionSteps: Add oats, walnuts and ground almonds to a large bowl and mix together.
Add peanut butter, honey and cinnamon and mix.
Add carrot and raisins to the mixture and mix until a everything has stuck together.
Form into 12 balls and place on baking paper.
